
Electrical elements (bus-based)
---------------------------------
These are electrical components that can be added to compose the grid topology

Auxiliary components (element-based)
------------------------------------
These components provide control and monitoring function. They are not directly part of the grid topology. Their collocation in the system is determined by element, transformer winding, etc.
Regcontrol
''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.Regcontrol
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
Monitor
'''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.Monitor
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
BusVoltageMonitor
'''''''''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.BusVoltageMonitor
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
StorageController
'''''''''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.StorageController
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   

Transmission line definition
----------------------------
These entities define transmission line parameters, directly via impedance matrix specification (LineCode) or via an arrangement of conductors defined in the Circuit (see section "Conductor definition")

LineCode_S
''''''''''''   
.. autoclass:: krangpower.LineCode_S
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
LineCode_A
''''''''''''   
.. autoclass:: krangpower.LineCode_A
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
LineGeometry_O
''''''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.LineGeometry_O
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:   

LineGeometry_T
''''''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.LineGeometry_T
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:   

LineGeometry_C
''''''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.LineGeometry_C
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
Conductor definition (for LineGeometry)
---------------------------------------
These entities are capable of memorizing the physical and geometrical data of conductors intended to be arranged in a LineGeometry. The backend then derives the impedance matrix of the line for the simulation.

WireData
''''''''''''   
.. autoclass:: krangpower.WireData
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
TSData
''''''''''''   
.. autoclass:: krangpower.TSData
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
CNData
''''''''''''   
.. autoclass:: krangpower.CNData
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
Curves and dependencies
-----------------------
These are auxiliary object that are used to manage data-points, mainly electrical characteristics and time-dependent quantities, for sequential simulations (duty-cycle, etc.) of a Circuit. Typical examples are inverter efficiencies, memorized in Curve (with 'xycurve' parameter), temperature profiles (Curve with 'thsape' parameter) and Load histories, memorized in loadshapes.

Loadshape
'''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.Loadshape
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:

CsvLoadshape
''''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.CsvLoadshape
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
   
Curve
''''''''''''
.. autoclass:: krangpower.CsvLoadshape
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :inherited-members:
